page.title: 09THE CREST HOTEL
page.content: The Crest Hotel is a modern 3 storied building with many luxurious facilities. It is very close to the M32 which leads into the centre of Bristol, and so it is very popular with business men using that city. Over 200 people are employed with 3 managers always on duty and usually 10 chefs in the kitchen. When there are functions or conferences in the one large hall (which can be partitioned off to make 4 rooms) 1,500 meals can be provided. There are 151 bedrooms, half being double rooms at Â£53 per night, and half being twin bedrooms at Â£45 per person. Because weekends are not so busy Crest offer special rates to family groups. The Crest company were one of the first to recognise women executives, hence they attract and encourage custom from women.
